document_data.name: budback spiders
document_data.mainbody: '''Budback spiders''' were vermin from the [[Khopet-Dag]] mountains in the [[Hordelands]].{{cite book/Sentinelspire||10}}
document_data.Description: These spiders were about the size of a [[human]] thumb.
document_data.Behavior: Budback spiders liked to bite whenever they were annoyed. They were [[poison]]ous, but their poison was not harmful, not even if dozens of them were involved.{{cite book/Sentinelspire||7}} It took a whole [[spider swarm|swarm]] of them biting for their poison to incapacitate a man. However, they did not swarm naturally, though [[magic]] could compel them to form such a swarm.
document_data.History: On the night of [[Tarsakh 15]], in the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, the [[druid]] [[Berun]] used budback spiders to incapacitate several [[assassin]]s.
